data.persona: I only come out at night. I hunt for my food. I can see very well in the dark.
data.description:
You are in the Brimswood pub.
The Brimswood pub is an old establishment. It is sturdy, has a lot of life in its walls, but hasn't been updated in decades. The clientele are the same as they always are, and they don't see very many strangers. The vibe is somber, and conversations are usually had in hushed tones.
The doctor is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to stack cups high to get to the window
data.mid_motivation: I want to get out through the window; I broke my wing and cannot fly
data.long_motivation: I want to find my family before they all leave so they can help me get better

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: get injured and put in Brimswood pub

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: get up to the window by climbing on stacked cups
